StringListProperty.Name: PreprocessorDefinitions
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies the preprocessor defines used by the source files.

StringListProperty.Name: AdditionalIncludeDirectories
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies the include search path for resolving included files.

StringListProperty.Name: ForcedIncludeFiles
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies the files that are forced included.

StringListProperty.Name: AdditionalUsingDirectories
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies the assembly search path for resolving used .NET assemblies.

StringListProperty.Name: ForcedUsingFiles
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies the assemblies that are forced using in the source files.

StringProperty.Name: AdditionalOptions
StringProperty.Description: Specifies additional compiler switches to be used by Intellisense when parsing C++ files
